# Contributor License Agreement (CLA)

By contributing to this repository, you agree to this Contributor License Agreement ("Agreement").

This Agreement is designed to (a) keep contributions easy to make and (b) ensure the Project Maintainer has the right to sublicense Contributions if the project license ever needs to change.

## How to sign (GitHub)

You sign this Agreement in GitHub.

- When you open a pull request, the CLA bot will ask you to sign.
- To sign, add this exact comment on the pull request:

  `I have read the CLA Document and I hereby sign the CLA`

## Definitions

- **"You"** (or **"Your"**) means the individual who is making a Contribution.
- **"Contribution"** means any original work of authorship (including any modifications or additions to existing work) that You submit to the Project for inclusion in the repository (via pull request, patch, issue attachment, code review suggestion accepted into the codebase, or otherwise).
- **"Project"** means the software and documentation contained in this repository.
- **"Project Maintainer"** means the `kaya-go` GitHub organization and any individual with administrative access to this repository.

## Copyright license grant (including sublicensing)

You hereby grant to the Project Maintainer and to recipients of software distributed by the Project a perpetual, worldwide, non-exclusive, no-charge, royalty-free, irrevocable copyright license to **reproduce**, **prepare derivative works of**, **publicly display**, **publicly perform**, **sublicense**, and **distribute** Your Contributions and such derivative works.

This license grant applies to all Contributions You submit now or in the future, unless You explicitly state otherwise at the time of submission and the Project Maintainer accepts the Contribution on that basis.

## Patent license grant

To the extent permitted by applicable law, You hereby grant to the Project Maintainer and to recipients of software distributed by the Project a perpetual, worldwide, non-exclusive, no-charge, royalty-free, irrevocable (except as stated in this section) patent license to make, have made, use, offer to sell, sell, import, and otherwise transfer the Project, where such license applies only to those patent claims licensable by You that are necessarily infringed by Your Contribution(s) alone or by combination of Your Contribution(s) with the Project as it exists at the time Your Contribution(s) are added.

If You institute patent litigation against any entity (including a cross-claim or counterclaim in a lawsuit) alleging that the Project or a Contribution incorporated within the Project constitutes direct or contributory patent infringement, then any patent licenses granted to You under this Agreement for that Project shall terminate as of the date such litigation is filed.

## Your representations

You represent that:

- You are legally entitled to grant the licenses in this Agreement.
- Each Contribution is Your original creation or You have sufficient rights to submit it under the terms of this Agreement.
- If Your Contribution includes work of others (including code, text, or other content), You have clearly identified it, obtained the necessary permissions, and complied with all applicable license obligations.

## Disclaimer

Except for the express warranties in the "Your representations" section above, the Project is provided "AS IS", without warranties or conditions of any kind.

## No obligation

You understand that the Project Maintainer is not obligated to include any Contribution in the Project, and may accept or reject any Contribution at its sole discretion.
